external_references.description: Daniel Lunghi. (2023, March 1). Iron Tiger’s SysUpdate Reappears, Adds Linux Targeting. Retrieved March 20, 2023.
Pantazopoulos, N., Henry T. (2018, May 18). Emissary Panda – A potential new malicious tool. Retrieved June 25, 2018.

description: [Threat Group-3390](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0027)'s malware can add a Registry key to `Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run` for persistence.(Citation: Nccgroup Emissary Panda May 2018)(Citation: Lunghi Iron Tiger Linux)
